author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- isolated the components of the cut parser to their own subdirectory within the interface directory.
- mutable which were being used as temporary storage were either removed or changed to thread safe containers. Using to container allows each thread to get its own temporary instance of the storage and returns it for later use when it is no longer needed.
- extended the thread based unit test to also test that an object shared across threads operates properly.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. All unit tests pass.
title: The cut parser is now const-thread-safe
